data.title: From Gul Panag to Dipannita Sharma: Meet 5 women who were linked with Milind Soman before Ankita Konwar entered his life
data.meta_description: From Gul Panag to Dipannita Sharma: Meet 5 women who were linked with Milind Soman before Ankita Konwar entered his life - So here's a look at Milind Soman's previous relationships...
data.text:
Milind Soman is soon going to tie the knot with 26-year-old girlfriend, air hostess Ankita Konwar today. But this isn't the first lady to be smitten by the charming model-turned-actor, Triathlon winner. Before his two year long relationship with Ankita, Milind was linked with some other women. Some were rumoured to be in a relationship with him, some were official. However, this will be the second time, that Milind will tie the knot. So here's a look at some of his past relationships...

Mylene Jampanoi

The French actress is Milind's first wife. They met during Valley of Flowers shoot in 2006. They soon exchanged marriage vows in July 2006 at a tourist resort in Goa. But after two years they called it quits in 2008 due to their long distance relationship. The couple got divorced in 2009.

Madhu Sapre

She is known to be Milind's first girlfriend. The couple made headlines for featuring twined together in the buff with just shoes on. They were living in together in Mumbai. However, they parted ways in 1995.

Dipannita Sharma

Milind and Dipannita starred together in two movies, 16 December and Jodi Breakers. They were rumoured to be dating since 2002 and their chemistry in 16 December fuelled the reports. According to the reports of TOI, he shared a flat in Mumbai with Dipannita and Bipasha Basu during that period.

Shahana Goswami

Shahana and Milind grabbed a lot of attention for being spotted together at public events and also featuring on magazine covers. They had an age difference of 21 years and were criticised by many. After Mylene, this was Milind's first publicised relationship. However, they parted ways after dating for four years.

Gul Panag

Another rumoured relationship of Milind includes Gul Panag. They starred together in Jurm and soon rumour mills were abuzz that they were dating. Eventually, Milind cleared the air and declared that they only have a 'professional relationship.'

Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for the latest scoops and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood, South, TV and Web-Series.
